entries: A nivell 17, you can create up to four duplicates of yourself, instead of one, when you use Invoke Duplicity. Com a acció bonus en el teu torn, you can move any number of them fins a 30 peus, to a maximum range of 120 feet.

subclassFeature.name: Knowledge Domain (PSA)
entries: "The worthy shall cultivate a nimble mind that can perceive the wonders beyond imagination that wait in the afterlife."

Kefnet's task is to pass on this teaching of the God-Pharaoh and elucidate its meaning. He teaches that the afterlife will be inhabited only by those who have proved by their wits that they are worthy of dwelling in the glorious presence of the God-Pharaoh. He trains acolytes and initiates to push their limits and challenge their mental capacity with spells of ever-greater power.
Kefnet's domain is identical to the Knowledge domain in the Player's Handbook.

subclassFeature.name: Subclass Feature
entries: See the Knowledge domain.

subclassFeature.name: Subclass Feature
entries: See the Knowledge domain.

subclassFeature.name: Subclass Feature
entries: See the Knowledge domain.

subclassFeature.name: Subclass Feature
entries: See the Knowledge domain.

subclassFeature.name: Solidarity Domain (PSA)
entries: "The worthy must know and respect all others whom the God-Pharaoh deems worthy, for in the afterlife, all will be united in purpose and action."

Oketra is charged with expounding upon this teaching of the God-Pharaoh, instilling in every initiate the virtue of solidarity. She forges each group of children into a crop of acolytes with just one purpose: to be judged worthy of a glorious afterlife. And she instills in each crop the ability to unite in a single action in pursuit of that purpose. She is fond of poetic imagery to communicate her ideals.
At each indicated cleric level, add the listed spells to your spells prepared.

entries.caption: Solidarity Domain Spells
rows: {@spell cercle de poder}, {@spell curar ferides massiu}

subclassFeature.name: Competència Adicional
entries: When you choose this domain a nivell 1, tens competència amb heavy armor.

subclassFeature.name: Solidarity's Action
entries: També a nivell 1, quan prèns l'acció {@action Ajudar} to aid an ally's attack, you can make one weapon attack com a acció bonus. Pots emprar aquest tret un número de cops equivalent al teu modificador de Saviesa (mínim 1 cop). En recuperes tots els usos quan acabis un Descans Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Channel Divinity: Preserve Life
entries: Començant a nivell 2, you can use your Channel Divinity to heal the badly injured.

Com a acció, you present your holy symbol and evoke healing energy that can restore a number of punts de vida equal to five times your cleric level. Choose any creatures a 30 peus de tu, and divide those punts de vida among them. This feature can restore a creature to no more than half of its punts de vida màxims. You can't use this feature on an undead or a construct.

subclassFeature.name: Oketra's Blessing
entries: A nivell 6, when a creature a 30 peus de tu makes an attack roll, pots, com a reacció, grant that creature a +10 bonus to the roll, using your Channel Divinity. You make this choice after you see the roll, but before the DM says whether the attack hits or misses.

subclassFeature.name: Blessed Strikes
entries: {@i {@variantrule optional class features|tce|Tret opcional} pel cleric a nivell 8, which replaces the Divine Strike feature}

You are blessed with divine might in battle. When a creature takes damage from one of your cantrips or weapon attacks, you can also deal {@damage 1d8} de dany radiant to that creature. Once you deal this damage, no pots tornar a emprar aquest tret fins l'inici del teu proper torn.

subclassFeature.name: Blessed Strikes
entries: {@i tret de cleric Divine Domain a nivell 8 (substitueix Divine Strike)}

In battle, you are blessed with divine might. When a creature takes damage from one of your spells or weapon attacks, you can also deal {@damage 1d8} de dany radiant to that creature. Once you deal this damage, no pots tornar a emprar aquest tret fins l'inici del teu proper torn.

subclassFeature.name: Divine Strike
entries: A nivell 8, you gain the ability to infuse your weapon strikes with divine energy. Un cop a cada torn teu quan impactes a una criatura amb un atac armat, you can cause the attack to deal an extra {@damage 1d8} damage of the same type dealt by the weapon to the target. Quan arribes a nivell 14, the extra damage increases to {@dice 2d8}.

subclassFeature.name: Supreme Healing
entries: Començant a nivell 17, when you would normally roll one or more dice to restore punts de vida with a spell, you instead use the highest number possible for each die. For example, instead of restoring {@dice 2d6} punts de vida to a creature, you restore 12.

subclassFeature.name: Força Domain (PSA)
entries: "The worthy shall hone a strong body that can withstand the boundless energies of the afterlife."

It falls to Rhonas to instill this teaching in those who would enter the afterlife—but to his mind, the words themselves don't matter. Força can't be taught. It must be built through practice and training. Rhonas demonstrates his teachings by his example, rather than by giving his students any kind of academic instruction. He welcomes the people of Naktamun to stand by the Hekma and watch him as he storms into the desert to battle the greatest horrors. He encourages them to observe his indomitable strength, for though they will never equal it, they can aspire to mimicry. He invites them to scrutinize every move and practice what they see.
At each indicated cleric level, add the listed spells to your spells prepared.

subclassFeature.name: Acolyte of Força
entries: A nivell 1, you learn one druid cantrip (escull). You also gain proficiency in one of the following skills (escull): {@skill Animal Handling}, {@skill Athletics}, {@skill Nature}, or {@skill Survival}.

subclassFeature.name: Competència Adicional
entries: També a nivell 1, tens competència amb heavy armor.

subclassFeature.name: Channel Divinity: Feat of Força
entries: A nivell 2, you can use your Channel Divinity to enhance your physical might. When you make an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw using Força, you can use your Channel Divinity to gain a +10 bonus to the roll. You make this choice after you see the roll, but before the DM says whether the roll succeeds or fails.

subclassFeature.name: Rhonas's Blessing
entries: A nivell 6, when a creature a 30 peus de tu makes an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw using Força, pots, com a reacció, grant that creature a +10 bonus to the roll, using your Channel Divinity. You make this choice after you see the roll, but before the DM says whether the roll succeeds or fail.

subclassFeature.name: Blessed Strikes
entries: {@i {@variantrule optional class features|tce|Tret opcional} pel cleric a nivell 8, which replaces the Divine Strike feature}

You are blessed with divine might in battle. When a creature takes damage from one of your cantrips or weapon attacks, you can also deal {@damage 1d8} de dany radiant to that creature. Once you deal this damage, no pots tornar a emprar aquest tret fins l'inici del teu proper torn.

subclassFeature.name: Blessed Strikes
entries: {@i tret de cleric Divine Domain a nivell 8 (substitueix Divine Strike)}

In battle, you are blessed with divine might. When a creature takes damage from one of your spells or weapon attacks, you can also deal {@damage 1d8} de dany radiant to that creature. Once you deal this damage, no pots tornar a emprar aquest tret fins l'inici del teu proper torn.

subclassFeature.name: Divine Strike
entries: A nivell 8, you gain the ability to infuse your weapon strikes with divine energy. Un cop a cada torn teu quan impactes a una criatura amb un atac armat, you can cause the attack to deal an extra {@damage 1d8} damage of the same type dealt by the weapon to the target. Quan arribes a nivell 14, the extra damage increases to {@dice 2d8}.

subclassFeature.name: Avatar of Battle
entries: A nivell 17, you gain resistance to dany contundent, tallant, i perforant from nonmagical attacks.

subclassFeature.name: Zeal Domain (PSA)
entries: "The worthy shall rush to the God-Pharaoh's side with relentless zeal, rising to overcome every obstacle in their way."

The God-Pharaoh expects those he welcomes into the afterlife to desire it above all other pleasures and achievements, and for them to show their dedication, passion, and fervor through their actions. Hazoret is charged with cultivating this zeal in the initiates who come under her care, and she has undertaken the task with appropriate enthusiasm. She recognizes, however, that the best way to teach zeal is by demonstrating it.
At each indicated cleric level, add the listed spells to your spells prepared.

entries.caption: Zeal Domain Spells
rows: {@spell escut de foc||fire shield (warm shield only)}, {@spell llibertat de moviments}

subclassFeature.name: Competències Adicionals
entries: A nivell 1, tens competència amb martial weapons and heavy armor.

subclassFeature.name: Priest of Zeal
entries: From 1st level, Hazoret delivers bolts of inspiration to you while you are engaged in battle. Quan prèns l'acció {@action Atacar}, you can make one weapon attack com a acció bonus.
Pots emprar aquest tret un número de cops equivalent al teu modificador de Saviesa (mínim d'1 cop). En recuperes tots els usos quan acabis un Descans Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Channel Divinity: Consuming Fervor
entries: Començant a nivell 2, you can use your Channel Divinity to channel your zeal into unchecked ferocity.
When you roll fire or thunder damage, you can use your Channel Divinity to deal maximum damage instead of rolling.

subclassFeature.name: Resounding Strike
entries: A nivell 6, when you deal thunder damage to a Large or smaller creature, you can also push it fins a 10 peus lluny de tu.

subclassFeature.name: Blessed Strikes
entries: {@i {@variantrule optional class features|tce|Tret opcional} pel cleric a nivell 8, which replaces the Divine Strike feature}

You are blessed with divine might in battle. When a creature takes damage from one of your cantrips or weapon attacks, you can also deal {@damage 1d8} de dany radiant to that creature. Once you deal this damage, no pots tornar a emprar aquest tret fins l'inici del teu proper torn.

subclassFeature.name: Blessed Strikes
entries: {@i tret de cleric Divine Domain a nivell 8 (substitueix Divine Strike)}

In battle, you are blessed with divine might. When a creature takes damage from one of your spells or weapon attacks, you can also deal {@damage 1d8} de dany radiant to that creature. Once you deal this damage, no pots tornar a emprar aquest tret fins l'inici del teu proper torn.

subclassFeature.name: Divine Strike
entries: A nivell 8, you gain the ability to infuse your weapon strikes with divine energy. Un cop a cada torn teu quan impactes a una criatura amb un atac armat, you can cause the attack to deal an extra {@damage 1d8} damage of the same type dealt by the weapon to the target. Quan arribes a nivell 14, the extra damage increases to {@dice 2d8}.

subclassFeature.name: Blaze of Glory
entries: Començant a nivell 17, you can delay death for an instant to perform a final heroic act.

When you are reduced to 0 punts de vida by an attacker que puguis veure, even if you would be killed outright, pots, com a reacció, move up to your speed toward the attacker and fer un atac armat cos a cos against it, as long as the movement brings it within your reach. You make this attack with advantage. Si impactes, the creature takes an extra {@damage 5d10} de dany de foc and an extra {@damage 5d10} damage of the weapon's type. You then fall {@condition unconscious} and begin making salvades de mort as normal, or you die if the damage you took would have killed you outright.
Quan empris aquest tret, no hi pots tornar fins que acabis un Descans Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Arcana Domain
entries: Magic is an energy that suffuses the multiverse and that fuels both destruction and creation. Gods of the Arcana domain know the secrets and potential of magic intimately. For some of these gods, magical knowledge is a great responsibility that comes with a special understanding of the nature of reality. Other gods of Arcana see magic as pure power, to be used as its wielder sees fit.

The gods of this domain are often associated with knowledge, as learning and arcane power tend to go hand-in-hand. In the Realms, deities of this domain include Azuth and Mystra, as well as Corellon Larethian of the elven pantheon. In other worlds, this domain includes Hecate, Math Mathonwy, and Isis; the triple moon gods of Solinari, Lunitari, and Nuitari of Krynn; and Boccob, Vecna, and WeeJas of Greyhawk.
At each indicated cleric level, add the listed spells to your spells prepared. They do not count towards your limit.

subclassFeature.name: Arcane Initiate
entries: When you choose this domain a nivell 1, you gain proficiency in the {@skill Arcana}, and you gain two cantrips (escull) de la llista de conjurs de mag. For you, these cantrips count as cleric cantrips.

subclassFeature.name: Channel Divinity: Arcane Abjuration
entries: Començant a nivell 2, you can use your Channel Divinity to abjure otherworldly creatures.

Com a acció, you present your holy symbol, and one celestial, elemental, fey, or fiend (escull) a 30 peus de tu ha de salvar per Saviesa, provided that the creature can see or hear you. If the creature fails its saving throw, it is turned durant 1 minut or until it takes any damage.

A turned creature must spend its turns trying to move as far away from you as it can, and it can't willingly end its move in a space a 30 peus de tu. It also can't take reactions. For its action, it can use only l'acció {@action Córrer} or try to escape from an effect that prevents it from moving. If there's nowhere to move, then the creature can use l'acció {@action Esquivar}.

After you reach 5th level, when a creature fails its saving throw against your Arcane Abjuration feature, the creature is banished durant 1 minut (as in the {@spell banishment} spell, no concentration required) if it isn't on its plane of origin, and its challenge rating is at or below a certain threshold, as shown below.

subclassFeature.name: Spell Breaker
entries: Començant a nivell 6, when you restore punts de vida to an ally with a spell of 1st level or higher, you can also end one spell (escull) on that creature. The level of the spell you end must be equal to or lower than the level of the spell slot you use to cast the healing spell.

subclassFeature.name: Blessed Strikes
entries: {@i {@variantrule optional class features|tce|Tret opcional} pel cleric a nivell 8, which replaces the Potent Spellcasting feature}

You are blessed with divine might in battle. When a creature takes damage from one of your cantrips or weapon attacks, you can also deal {@damage 1d8} de dany radiant to that creature. Once you deal this damage, no pots tornar a emprar aquest tret fins l'inici del teu proper torn.

subclassFeature.name: Blessed Strikes
entries: {@i tret de cleric Divine Domain a nivell 8 (substitueix Potent Spellcasting)}

In battle, you are blessed with divine might. When a creature takes damage from one of your spells or weapon attacks, you can also deal {@damage 1d8} de dany radiant to that creature. Once you deal this damage, no pots tornar a emprar aquest tret fins l'inici del teu proper torn.

subclassFeature.name: Potent Llançament de Conjurs
entries: Començant a nivell 8, you add el teu modificador de Saviesa to the damage you deal with any cleric cantrip.

subclassFeature.name: Arcane Mastery
entries: A nivell 17, you choose four spells de la llista de conjurs de mag, one from each of the following levels: 6th, 7th, 8th, and 9th. You add them to your list of domain spells. Like your other domain spells, they are always prepared and count as cleric spells for you.

subclassFeature.name: Order Domain
entries: The Order Domain represents discipline, as well as devotion to a society or an institution and strict obedience to the laws governing it. On Ravnica, the domain is favored by clerics of the Azorius Senate, who use it to maintain and enforce the law, and of the Orzhov Syndicate, who exploit law and order for their personal gain. On other worlds, gods who grant access to this domain include Bane, Tyr, Majere, Erathis, Pholtus, Wee Jas, Aureon, Maglubiyet, Nuada, Athena, Anubis, Forseti, and Asmodeus.

The ideal of order is obedience to the law above all else, rather than to a specific individual or the passing influence of emotion or popular rule. Clerics of order are typically concerned with how things are done, rather than whether an action's results are just. Following the law and obeying its edicts is critical, especially when it benefits these clerics and their guilds or deities.

Law establishes hierarchies. Those selected by the law to lead must be obeyed. Those who obey must do so to the best of their ability. In this manner, law creates an intricate web of obligations that allows society to forge order and security in a chaotic multiverse.
At each indicated cleric level, you add the listed spells to your spells prepared.

subclassFeature.name: Competències Adicionals
entries: When you choose this domain a nivell 1, tens competència amb heavy armor. You also gain proficiency in the {@skill Intimidation} or {@skill Persuasion} (escull).

subclassFeature.name: Voice of Authority
entries: Començant a nivell 1, you can invoke the power of law to drive an ally to attack. If you cast a spell with a spell slot of 1st level or higher and target an ally with the spell, that ally can use their reaction immediately after the spell to make one weapon attack against a creature (escull) que puguis veure.
If the spell targets more than one ally, you choose the ally who can make the attack.

subclassFeature.name: Channel Divinity: Order's Demand
entries: Començant a nivell 2, you can use your Channel Divinity to exert an intimidating presence over others.

Com a acció, you present your holy symbol, and tota criatura que designis that can see or hear you a 30 peus de tu ha de salvar per Saviesa. or be {@condition charmed} per tu fins el final del teu proper torn or until the {@condition charmed} creature takes any damage. You can also cause any of the {@condition charmed} creatures to drop what they are holding when they fail the saving throw.

subclassFeature.name: Embodiment of the Law
entries: A nivell 6, you become remarkably adept at channeling magical energy to compel others.

If you cast a spell of the enchantment school using a spell slot of 1st level or higher, you can change the spell's casting time to 1 bonus action for this casting, provided the spell's casting time is normally 1 action.
Pots emprar aquest tret un número de cops equivalent al teu modificador de Saviesa (mínim 1 cop), i en recuperes tots els usos quan acabis un Descans Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Blessed Strikes
entries: {@i {@variantrule optional class features|tce|Tret opcional} pel cleric a nivell 8, which replaces the Divine Strike feature}

You are blessed with divine might in battle. When a creature takes damage from one of your cantrips or weapon attacks, you can also deal {@damage 1d8} de dany radiant to that creature. Once you deal this damage, no pots tornar a emprar aquest tret fins l'inici del teu proper torn.

subclassFeature.name: Blessed Strikes
entries: {@i tret de cleric Divine Domain a nivell 8 (substitueix Divine Strike)}

In battle, you are blessed with divine might. When a creature takes damage from one of your spells or weapon attacks, you can also deal {@damage 1d8} de dany radiant to that creature. Once you deal this damage, no pots tornar a emprar aquest tret fins l'inici del teu proper torn.

subclassFeature.name: Divine Strike
entries: A nivell 8, you gain the ability to infuse your weapon strikes with divine energy. Un cop a cada torn teu quan impactes a una criatura amb un atac armat, you can cause the attack to deal an extra {@damage 1d8} de dany psíquic to the target. Quan arribes a nivell 14, the extra damage increases to {@dice 2d8}.

subclassFeature.name: Order's Wrath
entries: Començant a nivell 17, enemies you designate for destruction wilt under the combined efforts of you and your allies. If you deal your Divine Strike damage to a creature en el teu torn, you can curse that creature fins l'inici del teu proper torn. The next time one of your allies hits the cursed creature with an attack, the target also takes {@damage 2d8} de dany psíquic, and the curse ends. You can curse a creature in this way only un cop per torn.

subclassFeature.name: Peace Domain
entries: The balm of peace thrives at the heart of healthy communities, between friendly nations, and in the souls of the kindhearted. The gods of peace inspire people of all sorts to resolve conflict and to stand up against those forces that try to prevent peace from flourishing. See the Peace Deities table for a list of some of the gods associated with this domain.

Clerics of the Peace Domain preside over the signing of treaties, and they are often asked to arbitrate in disputes. These clerics' blessings draw people together and help them shoulder one another's burdens, and the clerics' magic aids those who are driven to fight for the way of peace.

entries.name: Domain Spells
entries: {@i tret de Peace Domain a nivell 1}
You gain domain spells at the cleric levels listed in the Peace Domain Spells table. See the Divine Domain class feature for how domain spells work.

entries.caption: Peace Domain Spells
rows: {@spell aura of purity}, {@spell Otiluke's resilient sphere}

subclassFeature.name: Emboldening Bond
entries: {@i tret de Peace Domain a nivell 1}

You can forge an empowering bond among people who are at peace with one another. Com a acció, you choose a number of willing creatures a 30 peus de tu (this can include yourself) equal to el teu bonus de competència. You create a magical bond among them durant 10 minuts or fins que tornis a emprar aquest tret. While any bonded creature is within 30 feet of another, the creature can roll a {@dice d4} and add the number rolled to an attack roll, an ability check, or a saving throw it makes. Tota criatura can add the {@dice d4} no more than un cop per torn.
Pots emprar aquest tret tants cops com el teu bonus de competència, i en recuperes tots els usos quan acabis un Descans Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Implement of Peace
entries: {@i tret de Peace Domain a nivell 1}
You gain proficiency in the {@skill Insight}, {@skill Performance}, or {@skill Persuasion} (escull).

subclassFeature.name: Channel Divinity: Balm of Peace
entries: {@i tret de Peace Domain a nivell 2}

You can use your Channel Divinity to make your very presence a soothing balm. Com a acció, you can move up to your speed, without provoking opportunity attacks, and when you move within 5 feet of any other creature during this action, you can restore a number of punts de vida to that creature equal to {@dice 2d6} + el teu modificador de Saviesa (mínim d'1 punt de vida). A creature can receive this healing only once whenever you take this action.

subclassFeature.name: Protective Bond
entries: {@i tret de Peace Domain a nivell 6}

The bond you forge between people helps them protect each other. When a creature affected by your Emboldening Bond feature is about to take damage, a second bonded creature within 30 feet of the first can use its reaction to teleport en un espai desocupat within 5 feet of the first creature. The second creature then takes all the damage instead.

subclassFeature.name: Blessed Strikes
entries: {@i {@variantrule optional class features|tce|Tret opcional} pel cleric a nivell 8, which replaces the Potent Spellcasting feature}

You are blessed with divine might in battle. When a creature takes damage from one of your cantrips or weapon attacks, you can also deal {@damage 1d8} de dany radiant to that creature. Once you deal this damage, no pots tornar a emprar aquest tret fins l'inici del teu proper torn.

subclassFeature.name: Potent Llançament de Conjurs
entries: {@i tret de Peace Domain a nivell 8}
You add el teu modificador de Saviesa to the damage you deal with any cleric cantrip.

subclassFeature.name: Expansive Bond
entries: {@i tret de Peace Domain a nivell 17}

The benefits of your Emboldening Bond and Protective Bond features now work when the creatures are within 60 feet of each other. Moreover, when a creature uses Protective Bond to take someone else's damage, the creature has resistance to that damage.

subclassFeature.name: Twilight Domain
entries: The twilit transition from light into darkness often brings calm and even joy, as the day's labors end and the hours of rest begin. The darkness can also bring terrors, but the gods of twilight guard against the horrors of the night.

Clerics who serve these deities-examples of which appear on the Twilight Deities table-bring comfort to those who seek rest and protect them by venturing into the encroaching darkness to ensure that the dark is a comfort, not a terror.

entries.name: Domain Spells
entries: {@i tret de Twilight Domain a nivell 1}
You gain domain spells at the cleric levels listed in the Twilight Domain Spells table. See the Divine Domain class feature for how domain spells work.

entries.caption: Twilight Domain Spells
rows: {@spell aura of vitality}, {@spell Leomund's tiny hut}

subclassFeature.name: Competències Adicionals
entries: {@i tret de Twilight Domain a nivell 1}
Tens competència amb martial weapons and heavy armor.

subclassFeature.name: Eyes of Night
entries: {@i tret de Twilight Domain a nivell 1}

You can see through the deepest gloom. You have {@sense darkvision} out to a range of 300 feet. In that radius, que puguis veure in dim light as if it were bright light and in darkness as if it were dim light.

Com a acció, you can magically share the {@sense darkvision} of this feature with willing creatures que puguis veure a 10 peus de tu, up to a number of creatures equivalent al teu modificador de Saviesa (mínim d'una). The shared {@sense darkvision} dura 1 hora. Once you share it, no pots tornar-hi fins que acabis un Descans Llarg o fins que gastis un spell slot of any level to share it again.

subclassFeature.name: Vigilant Blessing
entries: {@i tret de Twilight Domain a nivell 1}

The night has taught you to be vigilant. Com a acció, you give one creature you touch (including possibly yourself) advantage on the next initiative roll the creature makes. This benefit ends immediately after the roll or if you use this feature again.

subclassFeature.name: Channel Divinity: Twilight Sanctuary
entries: {@i tret de Twilight Domain a nivell 2}
You can use your Channel Divinity to refresh your allies with soothing twilight.

Com a acció, you present your holy symbol, and a sphere of twilight emanates from you. The sphere is centered on you, has a 30-foot radius, and is filled with dim light. The sphere moves with you, and it dura 1 minut or until you are {@condition incapacitated} o si mors. Whenever a creature (including you) ends its turn in the sphere, you can grant that creature one of these benefits:

items: You grant it punts de vida temporals equal to {@dice 1d6} plus your cleric level.
You end one effect on it causing it to be {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}.

subclassFeature.name: Steps of Night
entries: {@i tret de Twilight Domain a nivell 6}

You can draw on the mystical power of night to rise into the air. Com a acció bonus when you are in dim light or darkness, you can magically give yourself a flying speed equal to your walking speed durant 1 minut. You can use this bonus action tants cops com el teu bonus de competència, i en recuperes tots els usos quan acabis un Descans Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Blessed Strikes
entries: {@i {@variantrule optional class features|tce|Tret opcional} pel cleric a nivell 8, which replaces the Divine Strike feature}

You are blessed with divine might in battle. When a creature takes damage from one of your cantrips or weapon attacks, you can also deal {@damage 1d8} de dany radiant to that creature. Once you deal this damage, no pots tornar a emprar aquest tret fins l'inici del teu proper torn.

subclassFeature.name: Divine Strike
entries: {@i tret de Twilight Domain a nivell 8}

You gain the ability to infuse your weapon strikes with divine energy. Un cop a cada torn teu quan impactes a una criatura amb un atac armat, you can cause the attack to deal an extra {@damage 1d8} de dany radiant. Quan arribes a nivell 14, the extra damage increases to {@dice 2d8}.

subclassFeature.name: Twilight Shroud
entries: {@i tret de Twilight Domain a nivell 17}
The twilight that you summon offers a protective embrace: you and your allies have half cover while in the sphere created by your Twilight Sanctuary.

subclassFeature.name: Love Domain (UA)
entries: {@note Note: The Love domain was included in a leaked pre-release version of {@i Unearthed Arcana 2020 Subclasses, Part 2}, and superseded by the Unity domain for the final release.}
Love exists in many forms—compassion, infatuation, friendly affection, and passionate love as a few facets. Whatever form these feelings take, the gods of love deepen the bonds between individuals.

Clerics of these gods preside over marriages and other familial bonding customs, but they also nurture the emotional bonds of friendship and camaraderie. Their divine blessings bolster and protect allies in battle through these deep bonds and enkindle flares of infatuation to spur their allies and confound their foes.

subclassFeature.name: Emboldening Bond
entries: {@i tret de Love Domain a nivell 1}

You can forge an empowering bond between allies. Com a acció, you can choose two willing creatures que puguis veure a 30 peus de tu (this can include yourself) and create a magical bond between them. While either bonded creature is within 30 feet of the other, the creature can roll a {@dice d4} and add the number rolled to an attack roll, an ability check, or a saving throw it makes. Tota criatura can add the {@dice d4} no more than un cop per torn. The bond dura 1 hora or fins que tornis a emprar aquest tret.
You can use this feature once, and you regain the ability to do so quan acabis un Descans Llarg. You can also expend a spell slot to use the feature again.

subclassFeature.name: Channel Divinity: Impulsive Infatuation
entries: {@i tret de Love Domain a nivell 2}
You can use your Channel Divinity to overwhelm a creature with a flash of short-lived but intense admiration for you, driving them to rash action in your defense.

Com a acció, you present your holy symbol and escull una criatura que puguis veure a 30 peus de tu. That creature ha de salvar per Saviesa; a creature can choose to fail this saving throw if it wishes. On a success, the creature is unaffected. On a failure, the creature is {@condition charmed} per tu fins l'inici del teu proper torn, and it must immediately use its reaction to make a weapon attack against a target you designate. If there are no valid targets, it uses its reaction to admire you.

subclassFeature.name: Protective Bond
entries: {@i tret de Love Domain a nivell 6}

The bond you forge between people shields them from harm. While either creature chosen for your Emboldening Bond feature is within 30 feet of the other, the creature can use its reaction to grant resistance to all damage to the other creature when that other creature takes damage. This resistance lasts fins el final del torn actual.

subclassFeature.name: Blessed Strikes
entries: {@i {@variantrule optional class features|tce|Tret opcional} pel cleric a nivell 8, which replaces the Potent Spellcasting feature}

You are blessed with divine might in battle. When a creature takes damage from one of your cantrips or weapon attacks, you can also deal {@damage 1d8} de dany radiant to that creature. Once you deal this damage, no pots tornar a emprar aquest tret fins l'inici del teu proper torn.

subclassFeature.name: Blessed Strikes
entries: {@i tret de cleric Divine Domain a nivell 8 (substitueix Potent Spellcasting)}

In battle, you are blessed with divine might. When a creature takes damage from one of your spells or weapon attacks, you can also deal {@damage 1d8} de dany radiant to that creature. Once you deal this damage, no pots tornar a emprar aquest tret fins l'inici del teu proper torn.

subclassFeature.name: Potent Llançament de Conjurs
entries: {@i tret de Love Domain a nivell 8}
You add el teu modificador de Saviesa to the damage you deal with any cleric cantrip.

subclassFeature.name: Enduring Unity
entries: {@i tret de Love Domain a nivell 17}

The bonds you create endure across vast distances. Creatures affected by your Emboldening Bond feature gain its benefits, as well as those of your Protective Bond feature, while they are on the same plane of existence as each other.

A més, when a creature chosen for your Emboldening Bond is reduced to 0 punts de vida, their bonded partner gains the following benefits durant 1 minut, or until the creature regains at least 1 punt de vida:

items: The creature has advantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws
The creature gains resistance to all damage
Com a acció, the creature can touch their bonded partner to expend and roll any number of Hit Dice. Their bonded partner regains a number of punts de vida equal to the total rolled.

subclassFeature.name: Unity Domain (UA)
entries: A sense of oneness shines at the heart of healthy communities, whether bound together by friendship, blood, faith, or some other uniting force. The gods of unity deepen such bonds and delight in their strength.

Clerics of these gods preside over marriages and other familial bonding customs, but they also nurture the emotional bonds of friendship and camaraderie. Their divine blessings bolster and protect allies in battle through these deep bonds and turn aside malign influences.

entries.caption: Unity Domain Spells
rows: {@spell aura of purity}, {@spell guardià de fe}

subclassFeature.name: Emboldening Bond
entries: {@i tret de Unity Domain a nivell 1}

You can forge an empowering bond between allies. Com a acció, you can choose two willing creatures que puguis veure a 30 peus de tu (this can include yourself) and create a magical bond between them. While either bonded creature is within 30 feet of the other, the creature can roll a {@dice d4} and add the number rolled to an attack roll, an ability check, or a saving throw it makes. Tota criatura can add the {@dice d4} no more than un cop per torn. The bond dura 1 hora or fins que tornis a emprar aquest tret.
You can use this feature once, and you regain the ability to do so quan acabis un Descans Llarg. You can also expend a spell slot to use the feature again.

subclassFeature.name: Channel Divinity: Shared Burden
entries: {@i tret de Unity Domain a nivell 2}
You can use your Channel Divinity to protect your allies through the strength of your shared bonds.

Quan una criatura que puguis veure a 30 peus de tu takes damage, pots, com a reacció, choose a number of other willing creatures que puguis veure, up to a number of creatures equivalent al teu modificador de Saviesa (mínim d'una). Distribute the damage taken between the original target and les criatures designades. Tota criatura must take at least 1 damage. Apply any damage resistance or vulnerability of the creatures involved after you distribute the damage.

subclassFeature.name: Protective Bond
entries: {@i tret de Unity Domain a nivell 6}

The bond you forge between people shields them from harm. While either creature chosen for your Emboldening Bond feature is within 30 feet of the other, the creature can use its reaction to grant resistance to all damage to the other creature when that other creature takes damage. This resistance lasts fins el final del torn actual.

subclassFeature.name: Blessed Strikes
entries: {@i {@variantrule optional class features|tce|Tret opcional} pel cleric a nivell 8, which replaces the Potent Spellcasting feature}

You are blessed with divine might in battle. When a creature takes damage from one of your cantrips or weapon attacks, you can also deal {@damage 1d8} de dany radiant to that creature. Once you deal this damage, no pots tornar a emprar aquest tret fins l'inici del teu proper torn.

subclassFeature.name: Blessed Strikes
entries: {@i tret de cleric Divine Domain a nivell 8 (substitueix Potent Spellcasting)}

In battle, you are blessed with divine might. When a creature takes damage from one of your spells or weapon attacks, you can also deal {@damage 1d8} de dany radiant to that creature. Once you deal this damage, no pots tornar a emprar aquest tret fins l'inici del teu proper torn.

subclassFeature.name: Potent Llançament de Conjurs
entries: {@i tret de Unity Domain a nivell 8}
You add el teu modificador de Saviesa to the damage you deal with any cleric cantrip.

subclassFeature.name: Enduring Unity
entries: {@i tret de Unity Domain a nivell 17}

The bonds you create endure across vast distances. Creatures affected by your Emboldening Bond feature gain its benefits, as well as those of your Protective Bond feature, while they are on the same plane of existence as each other.

A més, when a creature chosen for your Emboldening Bond is reduced to 0 punts de vida, their bonded partner gains the following benefits durant 1 minut, or until the creature regains at least 1 punt de vida:

items: The creature has advantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws
The creature gains resistance to all damage
Com a acció, the creature can touch their bonded partner to expend and roll any number of Hit Dice. Their bonded partner regains a number of punts de vida equal to the total rolled.

subclassFeature.name: Forge Domain (UA)
entries: The gods of the forge are patrons of artisans who work with metal, from a humble blacksmith who keeps a village in horseshoes and plow blades to the mighty elf artisan whose diamond-tipped arrows of mithral have felled demon lords. The gods of the forge teach that, with patience and hard work, even the most intractable metal can transform from a lump of ore to a beautifully wrought object. Clerics of these deities quest to search for objects lost to the forces of darkness, liberate mines overrun by orcs, and uncover rare and wondrous materials necessary to create potent magic items. Followers of these gods take great pride in their work, and they are willing to craft and use heavy armor and powerful weapons to protect them. Deities of this domain include Gond, Reorx, Onatar, Moradin, Hephaestus, and Goibhniu.
At each indicated cleric level, add the listed spells to your spells prepared.

subclassFeature.name: Blessing of the Forge
entries: A nivell 1, you gain the ability to imbue magic into a weapon or armor. Quan acabis un Descans Llarg, touch one nonmagical object that is a suit of armor or una arma simple o marcial. Until the end of your next long rest, the object becomes a magic item, granting a +1 bonus to AC if it's armor or a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls if it's a weapon.
Quan empris aquest tret, no hi pots tornar fins que acabis un Descans Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Competència Adicional
entries: When you choose this domain a nivell 1, tens competència amb heavy armor.

subclassFeature.name: Channel Divinity: Artisan's Blessing
entries: Començant a nivell 2, you can use your Channel Divinity to create simple items.

Starting at the beginning of a short rest, you conduct a ritual to your deity that grants you the ability to craft a finished item that is at least part metal. The item is completed at the end of the rest.

The object can be worth no more than 100 gp, and as part of this ritual you must expend metals, such as coins or other finished items, with a value equal to the item you want to make. The item can be an exact duplicate of a nonmagical item, such as a copy of a key, if you possess the original during your short rest.

subclassFeature.name: Soul of the Forge
entries: Començant a nivell 6, your mastery of the forge grants you a number of special abilities:

items: Tens +1 a la CA mentre vesteixis medium or heavy armor.
You gain resistance to fire damage.
When you hit a construct with an attack, you deal additional force damage to it equal to your cleric level.

subclassFeature.name: Blessed Strikes
entries: {@i {@variantrule optional class features|tce|Tret opcional} pel cleric a nivell 8, which replaces the Divine Strike feature}

You are blessed with divine might in battle. When a creature takes damage from one of your cantrips or weapon attacks, you can also deal {@damage 1d8} de dany radiant to that creature. Once you deal this damage, no pots tornar a emprar aquest tret fins l'inici del teu proper torn.

subclassFeature.name: Blessed Strikes
entries: {@i tret de cleric Divine Domain a nivell 8 (substitueix Divine Strike)}

In battle, you are blessed with divine might. When a creature takes damage from one of your spells or weapon attacks, you can also deal {@damage 1d8} de dany radiant to that creature. Once you deal this damage, no pots tornar a emprar aquest tret fins l'inici del teu proper torn.

subclassFeature.name: Divine Strike
entries: A nivell 8, you gain the ability to infuse your weapon strikes with the fiery power of the forge. Un cop a cada torn teu quan impactes a una criatura amb un atac armat, you can cause the attack to deal an extra {@damage 1d8} de dany de foc to the target. Quan arribes a nivell 14, the extra damage increases to {@dice 2d8}.

subclassFeature.name: Saint of Forge and Fire
entries: A nivell 17, your affinity for fire and metal becomes more powerful due to your deity's blessing. You gain immunity to fire damage, and while you're wearing heavy armor, tens resistència al dany contundent, perforant, i tallant from nonmagical attacks.

subclassFeature.name: Grave Domain (UA)
entries: Gods of the grave watch over the line between life and death. To these deities, death and the afterlife are a foundational part of the multiverse's workings. To resist death, or to desecrate the dead's rest, is an abomination. Deities of the grave include Kelemvor, WeeJas, the ancestral spirits of the Undying Court, Hades, Anubis, and Osiris. These deities teach their followers to respect the dead and pay them due homage. Followers of these deities seek to put restless spirits to rest, destroy the undead wherever they find them, and ease the suffering of dying creatures. Their magic also allows them to stave off a creature's death, though they refuse to use such magic to extend a creature's lifespan beyond its mortal limits.
At each indicated cleric level, add the listed spells to your spells prepared.

subclassFeature.name: Competència Adicional
entries: When you choose this domain a nivell 1, tens competència amb heavy armor.

subclassFeature.name: Circle of Mortality
entries: A nivell 1, you gain the ability to manipulate the line between life and death. When you cast a spell that restores punts de vida to a living creature currently at 0, treat any dice rolled to determine the spell's healing as having rolled their maximum result. A més, if you have the {@spell Rèquiem pels Morts} cantrip, you can cast it com a acció bonus.

subclassFeature.name: Eyes of the Grave
entries: Començant a nivell 1, you gain an innate sense of creatures whose existence is an insult to the natural cycle of life. If you spend 1 minute in uninterrupted contemplation, you can determine the presence and nature of undead creatures in the area. This detection extends up to 1 mile in all directions. You learn the number of undead and their distance and direction from you. A més, you learn the creature type of the undead in that area that has the highest challenge rating.
Quan empris aquest tret, no hi pots tornar fins que acabis un Descans Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Channel Divinity: Path to the Grave
entries: Començant a nivell 2, you can use your Channel Divinity to mark another creature's life force for termination.

Com a acció, you touch a creature. The next time that creature takes damage from a spell or an attack from you or an ally, it is vulnerable to that spell or attack's damage. If the source of damage has multiple damage types, the creature is vulnerable to all of them. The vulnerability applies only to the first time that source inflicts damage, and then ends.
If the creature has resistance or is immune to the damage, it instead loses its resistance or immunity against that spell or attack when it first applies damage.

subclassFeature.name: Sentinel at Death's Door
entries: Començant a nivell 6, you gain the ability to impede death's progress. Com a reacció when you or an ally que puguis veure a 30 peus de tu suffers a critical hit, you can turn that attack into a normal hit. Any effects triggered by a critical hit are canceled.
Un cop empris aquest tret, no pots tornar-hi fins que acabis un Descans Curt o Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Blessed Strikes
entries: {@i {@variantrule optional class features|tce|Tret opcional} pel cleric a nivell 8, which replaces the Divine Strike feature}

You are blessed with divine might in battle. When a creature takes damage from one of your cantrips or weapon attacks, you can also deal {@damage 1d8} de dany radiant to that creature. Once you deal this damage, no pots tornar a emprar aquest tret fins l'inici del teu proper torn.

subclassFeature.name: Blessed Strikes
entries: {@i tret de cleric Divine Domain a nivell 8 (substitueix Divine Strike)}

In battle, you are blessed with divine might. When a creature takes damage from one of your spells or weapon attacks, you can also deal {@damage 1d8} de dany radiant to that creature. Once you deal this damage, no pots tornar a emprar aquest tret fins l'inici del teu proper torn.

subclassFeature.name: Divine Strike
entries: A nivell 8, you gain the ability to infuse your weapon strikes with divine energy. Un cop a cada torn teu quan impactes a una criatura amb un atac armat, you can cause the attack to deal an extra {@damage 1d8} de dany necròtic. Quan arribes a nivell 14, the extra damage increases to {@dice 2d8}.

subclassFeature.name: Keeper of Souls
entries: A nivell 17, you gain the ability to manipulate the boundary between life and death. When an enemy que puguis veure dies a 30 peus de tu, you or one ally (escull) a 30 peus de tu regains punts de vida equal to the enemy's number of Hit Dice. You can use this feature as long as you aren't {@condition incapacitated}, but no more than once per round.

subclassFeature.name: Protection Domain (UA)
entries: The protection domain is the purview of deities who charge their followers to shield the weak from the strong. The gods' faithful dwell in villages and towns on the borderlands, where they help bolster defenses and seek out evils to defeat. These gods believe that a strong shield and a suit of armor is the best defense against evil, second only to a stout mace on hand to respond to any attacks in kind. Deities who grant this domain include Helm, Ilmater, Torm, Tyr, Heironeous, St. Cuthbert, Paladine, Dol Dorn, the Silver Flame, Bahamut, Yondalla, Athena, and Odin.
At each indicated cleric level, add the listed spells to your spells prepared.

entries.caption: Protection Domain Spells
rows: {@spell compelled duel}, {@spell protection from evil and good}
{@spell guardià de fe}, {@spell Otiluke's resilient sphere}

subclassFeature.name: Competència Adicional
entries: When you choose this domain a nivell 1, tens competència amb heavy armor.

subclassFeature.name: Shield of the Faithful
entries: Començant a nivell 1, you gain the ability to hinder attacks intended for others. When a creature attacks a target other than you a 5 peus de tu, pots, com a reacció, impose disadvantage on the attack roll. To do so, you must be able to see both the attacker and the target. You interpose an arm, a shield, or some other part of yourself to try to throw the attack off target.

subclassFeature.name: Channel Divinity: Radiant Defense
entries: Començant a nivell 2, you can use your Channel Divinity to cloak your allies in radiant armor.

Com a acció, you channel blessed energy into an ally que puguis veure a 30 peus de tu. The first time that ally is hit by an attack within the next minute, the attacker takes radiant damage equal to {@dice 2d10} + your cleric level.

subclassFeature.name: Blessed Healer
entries: Començant a nivell 6, the healing spells you cast on others can heal you as well. When you cast a spell with a spell slot and it restores punts de vida to any creature other than you this turn, you regain punts de vida equal to 2 + the spell's level.

subclassFeature.name: Blessed Strikes
entries: {@i {@variantrule optional class features|tce|Tret opcional} pel cleric a nivell 8, which replaces the Divine Strike feature}

You are blessed with divine might in battle. When a creature takes damage from one of your cantrips or weapon attacks, you can also deal {@damage 1d8} de dany radiant to that creature. Once you deal this damage, no pots tornar a emprar aquest tret fins l'inici del teu proper torn.

subclassFeature.name: Blessed Strikes
entries: {@i tret de cleric Divine Domain a nivell 8 (substitueix Divine Strike)}

In battle, you are blessed with divine might. When a creature takes damage from one of your spells or weapon attacks, you can also deal {@damage 1d8} de dany radiant to that creature. Once you deal this damage, no pots tornar a emprar aquest tret fins l'inici del teu proper torn.

subclassFeature.name: Divine Strike
entries: A nivell 8, you gain the ability to infuse your weapon strikes with divine energy. Un cop a cada torn teu quan impactes a una criatura amb un atac armat, you can cause the attack to deal an extra {@damage 1d8} de dany radiant to the target. Quan arribes a nivell 14, the extra damage increases to {@dice 2d8}.

subclassFeature.name: Indomitable Defense
entries: A nivell 17, you gain resistance to two damage types (escull), choosing from bludgeoning, necrotic, piercing, radiant, and slashing. Quan acabis un Descans Curt o Llarg, you can change the damage types you chose.

Com a acció, you can temporarily give up this resistance and transfer it to one creature you touch. The creature keeps the resistance until the end of your next short or long rest or until you transfer it back to yourself com a acció bonus.

subclassFeature.name: Twilight Domain (UA)
entries: The Twilight Domain governs the transition and blending of light into darkness. It is a time of rest and comfort, but also the threshold between safety and the unknown. Deities of healing or respite (such as Boldrei, Hestia, Mishakal, or Pelor), bravery or protection (such as Dol Arrah, Hajama, Helm, or Ilmater), travel or transition (such as Fharlanghn, Hermes, the Raven Queen, or the Traveler), or the night and dreams (such as Celestian, Morpheus, Nut, or Selûne) might grant their clerics the Twilight Domain. Clerics who serve these deities tend to be brave, delving into the dark to hold its dangers at bay and to bring comfort to those lost far from the light.
At each indicated cleric level, you add the listed spells to your spells prepared.

entries.caption: Twilight Domain Spells
rows: {@spell aura of vitality}, {@spell Leomund's tiny hut}

subclassFeature.name: Competència Adicional
entries: {@i tret de Twilight Domain a nivell 1}
Tens competència amb martial weapons and heavy armor.

subclassFeature.name: Eyes of Night
entries: {@i tret de Twilight Domain a nivell 1}

Your eyes are blessed, allowing you to see through the deepest gloom. You have {@sense darkvision} with no maximum range; que puguis veure in dim light as if it were bright light and in darkness as if it were dim light.

Com a acció, you can magically give the benefit of this feature to any number of creatures que puguis veure a 10 peus de tu. The shared benefit dura 10 minuts. You can extend this benefit a number of times equivalent al teu modificador de Saviesa (mínim d'1 cop), i en recuperes tots els usos quan acabis un Descans Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Vigilant Blessing
entries: {@i tret de Twilight Domain a nivell 1}

The night has taught you to be vigilant. Com a acció, you give one creature you touch (including possibly yourself) advantage on the next initiative roll the creature makes. This benefit ends immediately after the roll or if you use this feature again.

subclassFeature.name: Channel Divinity: Twilight Sanctuary
entries: {@i tret de Twilight Domain a nivell 2}
You can use your Channel Divinity to refresh your allies with soothing twilight.

Com a acció, you present your holy symbol, and a sphere of twilight emanates from you. The sphere is centered on you, has a 30-foot radius, and is filled with dim light. The sphere moves with you, and it dura 1 minut or until you are {@condition incapacitated} o si mors. Whenever a creature (including you) ends its turn in the sphere, you can grant that creature one of these benefits:

items: Give it {@dice 1d8} punts de vida temporals.
End one effect causing it to be {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}.

subclassFeature.name: Steps of the Brave
entries: {@i tret de Twilight Domain a nivell 6}
You draw strength from your connection to twilight and find yourself at home within its dark embrace, gaining two benefits:

items: Tens avantatge a saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.
If you are in dim light or darkness, pots, com a acció bonus, to magically give yourself a flying speed equal to your walking speed fins el final del teu proper torn.

subclassFeature.name: Blessed Strikes
entries: {@i {@variantrule optional class features|tce|Tret opcional} pel cleric a nivell 8, which replaces the Divine Strike feature}

You are blessed with divine might in battle. When a creature takes damage from one of your cantrips or weapon attacks, you can also deal {@damage 1d8} de dany radiant to that creature. Once you deal this damage, no pots tornar a emprar aquest tret fins l'inici del teu proper torn.

subclassFeature.name: Blessed Strikes
entries: {@i tret de cleric Divine Domain a nivell 8 (substitueix Divine Strike)}

In battle, you are blessed with divine might. When a creature takes damage from one of your spells or weapon attacks, you can also deal {@damage 1d8} de dany radiant to that creature. Once you deal this damage, no pots tornar a emprar aquest tret fins l'inici del teu proper torn.

subclassFeature.name: Divine Strike
entries: {@i tret de Twilight Domain a nivell 8}

You gain the ability to infuse your weapon strikes with divine energy. Un cop a cada torn teu quan impactes a una criatura amb un atac armat, you can cause the attack to deal an extra {@damage 1d8} de dany psíquic. Quan arribes a nivell 14, the extra damage increases to {@dice 2d8}.

subclassFeature.name: Midnight Shroud
entries: {@i tret de Twilight Domain a nivell 17}

You can harness the shrouding power of night to protect your allies and stymie your foes. Whenever you cast the {@spell foscor} spell using a spell slot, you can choose a number of creatures que puguis veure (including yourself) equivalent al teu modificador de Saviesa (mínim d'1). les criatures designades can see through the darkness.

subclassFeature.name: City Domain (UA)
entries: The City domain is concerned with the citizenry, commerce, traffic, and even architecture of modern civilization. In the eyes of a cleric of the city, the center of modern life is a sense and spirit of community, and the gravest enemies of the city are those who seek to harm the common weal of its citizens.
At each indicated cleric level, add the listed spells to your spells prepared. They do not count towards your limit.
Spells marked with an asterisk can be found in Unearthed Arcana: Modern Magic.

entries.caption: City Domain Spells
rows: {@spell llampec}, {@spell protection from ballistics (UA)|UAModernMagic|protection from ballistics}*
{@spell commune with city (UA)|UAModernMagic|commune with city}*, {@spell shutdown (UA)|UAModernMagic|shutdown}*

subclassFeature.name: Bonus Cantrip
entries: When you choose this domain a nivell 1, you gain the {@spell On/Off (UA)|UAModernMagic|on/off} cantrip in addition to your chosen cantrips.

subclassFeature.name: Competències Adicionals
entries: Also començant a nivell 1, tens competència amb sidearms and proficiency with vehicles (land).

subclassFeature.name: Heart of the City
entries: From 1st level, you are able to tap into the spirit of community found in the city. While you are within any city, you can gain advantage on a single Carisma ({@skill Deception}, {@skill Intimidation}, or {@skill Persuasion}), and you are considered proficient in the appropriate skill. Pots emprar aquest tret un número de cops equivalent al teu modificador de Saviesa (mínim d'1 cop). En recuperes tots els usos quan acabis un Descans Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Channel Divinity: Spirits of the City
entries: Començant a nivell 2, you can use your Channel Divinity to call on the city for aid. Com a acció, you present your holy symbol, and any city utility a 30 peus de tu either works perfectly or shuts down entirely durant 1 minut (escull).

A més, each hostile creature a 30 peus de tu ha de salvar per Carisma. Si falla, the creature is knocked {@condition prone} or {@condition restrained} (escull) by hazards such as entangling wires, high-pressure water erupting from fire hydrants, pavement collapsing to unseen potholes, and so on. A {@condition restrained} creature can escape by making a successful Força ({@skill Athletics}) or Destresa ({@skill Acrobatics}) contra la teva CD de salvació de conjur.

This effect is entirely local and affects only utilities a 30 peus de tu. Determination of what utilities are available within range and how the physical effects of those utilities manifest are left to the DM.

subclassFeature.name: Block Watch
entries: Començant a nivell 6, your awareness while in the city extends preternaturally. While in an urban environment, you are considered proficient in the {@skill Insight} i {@skill Perception}, and you add double el teu bonus de competència to Saviesa ({@skill Insight}) and Saviesa ({@skill Perception}), instead of your normal proficiency bonus.

subclassFeature.name: Blessed Strikes
entries: {@i {@variantrule optional class features|tce|Tret opcional} pel cleric a nivell 8, which replaces the Divine Strike feature}

You are blessed with divine might in battle. When a creature takes damage from one of your cantrips or weapon attacks, you can also deal {@damage 1d8} de dany radiant to that creature. Once you deal this damage, no pots tornar a emprar aquest tret fins l'inici del teu proper torn.

subclassFeature.name: Blessed Strikes
entries: {@i tret de cleric Divine Domain a nivell 8 (substitueix Divine Strike)}

In battle, you are blessed with divine might. When a creature takes damage from one of your spells or weapon attacks, you can also deal {@damage 1d8} de dany radiant to that creature. Once you deal this damage, no pots tornar a emprar aquest tret fins l'inici del teu proper torn.

subclassFeature.name: Divine Strike
entries: A nivell 8, you gain the ability to infuse your weapon strikes with psychic energy borrowed from the citizens of your city. Un cop a cada torn teu quan impactes a una criatura amb un atac armat, you can cause the attack to deal an extra {@damage 1d8} de dany psíquic to the target. Quan arribes a nivell 14, the extra psychic damage increases to {@dice 2d8}.

subclassFeature.name: Express Transit
entries: A nivell 17, you can use mass transit routes to transport instantaneously to other points in the city. Starting from a bus stop, train station, subway stop, or other suitable mass transit site within the city, you can teleport to any other similar transit stop within the city, as if you had cast a {@spell teleport} spell whose destination is a permanent {@spell teleportation circle} you know. Once you use this feature, you must finish a short or long rest before using it again.

subclassFeature.name: Order Domain (UA)
entries: The Order domain represents discipline, as well as service to a society or an institution, whether that service is rendered in obedience to or enforcement of the law—civil, religious, or both. Gods on many worlds grant access to this domain, including Bane, Tyr, Majere, Erathis, Pholtus, Wee Jas, Aureon, Maglubiyet, Nuada, Athena, Anubis, Forseti, and Asmodeus.

The ideal of order is obedience to the law above all else, rather than to a specific individual or the passing influence of emotion or popular rule. Clerics of order are typically concerned with how things are done, rather than whether an action's results are just. Following the law and obeying its edicts is critical, especially when it benefits these clerics and their deities.

More importantly, law establishes hierarchies. Those selected by the law to lead must be obeyed. Those who obey must do so to the best of their ability. In this manner, law creates an intricate web of obligations that allows society to forge order and security in a chaotic multiverse.
At each indicated cleric level, you add the listed spells to your spells prepared.

subclassFeature.name: Competència Adicional
entries: When you choose this domain a nivell 1, tens competència amb heavy armor.

subclassFeature.name: Voice of Authority
entries: Començant a nivell 1, you can invoke the power of law to drive an ally to attack. Immediatament after you cast a spell on an ally using a spell slot of 1st level or higher, that ally can use their reaction to make one weapon attack against a target (escull) que puguis veure. If the spell targets more than one ally, you choose the ally who can make the attack.

subclassFeature.name: Channel Divinity: Order's Demand
entries: Començant a nivell 2, you can use your Channel Divinity to exert an intimidating presence over others.

Com a acció, you present your holy symbol, and tota criatura que designis that can see or hear you a 30 peus de tu ha de salvar per Saviesa. or be {@condition charmed} per tu fins el final del teu proper torn or until the {@condition charmed} creature takes any damage. You can also cause any of the {@condition charmed} creatures to fall {@condition prone} when they fail the saving throw.

subclassFeature.name: Order's Dominion
entries: A nivell 6, you become extraordinarily adept at channeling magical energy to compel others.

When you cast a spell of the enchantment school using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you regain one expended spell slot. The slot you regain must be of a level lower than the spell you cast and can't be higher than 5th level.

subclassFeature.name: Blessed Strikes
entries: {@i {@variantrule optional class features|tce|Tret opcional} pel cleric a nivell 8, which replaces the Divine Strike feature}

You are blessed with divine might in battle. When a creature takes damage from one of your cantrips or weapon attacks, you can also deal {@damage 1d8} de dany radiant to that creature. Once you deal this damage, no pots tornar a emprar aquest tret fins l'inici del teu proper torn.

subclassFeature.name: Blessed Strikes
entries: {@i tret de cleric Divine Domain a nivell 8 (substitueix Divine Strike)}

In battle, you are blessed with divine might. When a creature takes damage from one of your spells or weapon attacks, you can also deal {@damage 1d8} de dany radiant to that creature. Once you deal this damage, no pots tornar a emprar aquest tret fins l'inici del teu proper torn.

subclassFeature.name: Divine Strike
entries: A nivell 8, you gain the ability to infuse your weapon strikes with divine energy. Un cop a cada torn teu quan impactes a una criatura amb un atac armat, you can cause the attack to deal an extra {@damage 1d8} de dany de força to the target. Quan arribes a nivell 14, the extra damage increases to {@dice 2d8}.

subclassFeature.name: Order's Wrath
entries: Començant a nivell 17, enemies you designate for destruction wilt under the combined efforts of you and your allies. If you deal your Divine Strike damage to a creature, that creature takes an extra {@damage 2d8} de dany de força the first time each turn that any ally of yours hits it with a weapon attack. This benefit lasts fins l'inici del teu proper torn.

subclassFeature.name: Forge Domain
entries: The gods of the forge are patrons of artisans who work with metal, from a humble blacksmith who keeps a village in horseshoes and plow blades to the mighty elf artisan whose diamond-tipped arrows of mithral have felled demon lords. The gods of the forge teach that, with patience and hard work, even the most intractable metal can be transformed from a lump of ore to a beautifully wrought object. Clerics of these deities search for objects lost to the forces of darkness, liberate mines overrun by orcs, and uncover rare and wondrous materials necessary to create potent magic items. Followers of these gods take great pride in their work, and they are willing to craft and use heavy armor and powerful weapons to protect them. Deities of this domain include Gond, Reorx, Onatar, Moradin, Hephaestus, and Goibhniu.
At each indicated cleric level, add the listed spells to your spells prepared.

subclassFeature.name: Blessing of the Forge
entries: A nivell 1, you gain the ability to imbue magic into a weapon or armor. Quan acabis un Descans Llarg, you can touch one nonmagical object that is a suit of armor or una arma simple o marcial. Until the end of your next long rest or until you die, the object becomes a magic item, granting a +1 bonus to AC if it's armor or a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls if it's a weapon.
Quan empris aquest tret, no hi pots tornar fins que acabis un Descans Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Competència Adicional
entries: When you choose this domain a nivell 1, tens competència amb heavy armor and {@item smith's eines|phb}.

subclassFeature.name: Channel Divinity: Artisan's Blessing
entries: Començant a nivell 2, you can use your Channel Divinity to create simple items.

You conduct an hour-long ritual that crafts a nonmagical item that must include some metal: una arma simple o marcial, a suit of armor, ten pieces of ammunition, a set of tools, or another metal object (see chapter 5, "Equipment," in the Player's Handbook for examples of these items). The creation is completed at the end of the hour, coalescing en un espai desocupat (escull) on a surface a 5 peus de tu.

The thing you create can be something that is worth no more than 100 gp. As part of this ritual, you must lay out metal, which can include coins, with a value equal to the creation. The metal irretrievably coalesces and transforms into the creation at the ritual's end, magically forming even nonmetal parts of the creation. The ritual can create a duplicate of a nonmagical item that contains metal, such as a key, if you possess the original during the ritual.

subclassFeature.name: Soul of the Forge
entries: Començant a nivell 6, your mastery of the forge grants you special abilities:

items: You gain resistance to fire damage.
While wearing heavy armor, tens +1 a la CA.

subclassFeature.name: Blessed Strikes
entries: {@i {@variantrule optional class features|tce|Tret opcional} pel cleric a nivell 8, which replaces the Divine Strike feature}

You are blessed with divine might in battle. When a creature takes damage from one of your cantrips or weapon attacks, you can also deal {@damage 1d8} de dany radiant to that creature. Once you deal this damage, no pots tornar a emprar aquest tret fins l'inici del teu proper torn.

subclassFeature.name: Blessed Strikes
entries: {@i tret de cleric Divine Domain a nivell 8 (substitueix Divine Strike)}

In battle, you are blessed with divine might. When a creature takes damage from one of your spells or weapon attacks, you can also deal {@damage 1d8} de dany radiant to that creature. Once you deal this damage, no pots tornar a emprar aquest tret fins l'inici del teu proper torn.

subclassFeature.name: Divine Strike
entries: A nivell 8, you gain the ability to infuse your weapon strikes with the fiery power of the forge. Un cop a cada torn teu quan impactes a una criatura amb un atac armat, you can cause the attack to deal an extra {@damage 1d8} de dany de foc to the target. Quan arribes a nivell 14, the extra damage increases to {@dice 2d8}.

subclassFeature.name: Saint of Forge and Fire
entries: A nivell 17, your blessed affinity with fire and metal becomes more powerful:

items: You gain immunity to fire damage
While wearing heavy armor, tens resistència al dany contundent, perforant, i tallant from nonmagical attacks.

subclassFeature.name: Grave Domain
entries: Gods of the grave watch over the line between life and death. To these deities, death and the afterlife are a foundational part of the multiverse. To desecrate the peace of the dead is an abomination. Deities of the grave include Kelemvor, Wee Jas, the ancestral spirits of the Undying Court, Hades, Anubis, and Osiris. Followers of these deities seek to put wandering spirits to rest, destroy the undead, and ease the suffering of the dying. Their magic also allows them to stave off death for a time, particularly for a person who still has some great work to accomplish in the world. This is a delay of death, not a denial of it, for death will eventually get its due.

subclassFeature.name: Circle of Mortality
entries: A nivell 1, you gain the ability to manipulate the line between life and death. When you would normally roll one or more dice to restore punts de vida with a spell to a creature at 0 punts de vida, you instead use the highest number possible for each die.
A més, aprèns el truc {@spell Rèquiem pels Morts}, which doesn't count against the number of cleric cantrips you know. For you, it has a range of 30 feet, and you can cast it com a acció bonus.

subclassFeature.name: Eyes of the Grave
entries: A nivell 1, you gain the ability to occasionally sense the presence of the undead, whose existence is an insult to the natural cycle of life. Com a acció, you can open your awareness to magically detect undead. Fins el final del teu proper torn, you know the location of any undead a 60 peus de tu that isn't behind total cover and that isn't protected from divination magic. This sense doesn't tell you anything about a creature's capabilities or identity.
Pots emprar aquest tret un número de cops equivalent al teu modificador de Saviesa (mínim 1 cop). En recuperes tots els usos quan acabis un Descans Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Channel Divinity: Path to the Grave
entries: Començant a nivell 2, you can use your Channel Divinity to mark another creature's life force for termination.

Com a acció, you escull una criatura que puguis veure a 30 peus de tu, cursing it fins el final del teu proper torn. The next time you or an ally of yours hits the cursed creature with an attack, the creature has vulnerability to all of that attack's damage, and then the curse ends.

subclassFeature.name: Sentinel at Death's Door
entries: A nivell 6, you gain the ability to impede death's progress. Com a reacció when you or a creature que puguis veure a 30 peus de tu suffers a critical hit, you can turn that hit into a normal hit. Any effects triggered by a critical hit are canceled.
Pots emprar aquest tret un número de cops equivalent al teu modificador de Saviesa (mínim 1 cop). En recuperes tots els usos quan acabis un Descans Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Blessed Strikes
entries: {@i {@variantrule optional class features|tce|Tret opcional} pel cleric a nivell 8, which replaces the Potent Spellcasting feature}

You are blessed with divine might in battle. When a creature takes damage from one of your cantrips or weapon attacks, you can also deal {@damage 1d8} de dany radiant to that creature. Once you deal this damage, no pots tornar a emprar aquest tret fins l'inici del teu proper torn.

subclassFeature.name: Blessed Strikes
entries: {@i tret de cleric Divine Domain a nivell 8 (substitueix Potent Spellcasting)}

In battle, you are blessed with divine might. When a creature takes damage from one of your spells or weapon attacks, you can also deal {@damage 1d8} de dany radiant to that creature. Once you deal this damage, no pots tornar a emprar aquest tret fins l'inici del teu proper torn.

subclassFeature.name: Potent Llançament de Conjurs
entries: Començant a nivell 8, you add el teu modificador de Saviesa to the damage you deal with any cleric cantrip.

subclassFeature.name: Keeper of Souls
entries: Començant a nivell 17, you can seize a trace of vitality from a parting soul and use it to heal the living. When an enemy que puguis veure dies a 60 peus de tu, you or one creature (escull) a 60 peus de tu regains punts de vida equal to the enemy's number of Hit Dice. Només pots emprar aquest tret if you aren't {@condition incapacitated}. Once you use it, no pots tornar-hi fins l'inici del teu proper torn.
